lead_paragraph: The case of Rev. Lawrence C. Murphy is more striking because of the number and vulnerability of the victims and the availability of documents revealing how church officials handled the matter.
snippet: The case of Rev. Lawrence C. Murphy is more striking because of the number and vulnerability of the victims and the availability of documents revealing how church officials handled the matter.

headline.main: Events in the Case of an Accused Priest
headline.seo: Documents Detail Case of Priest Accused of Molesting Deaf Boys
